Name: Acid Trip
About the game: Welcome to Acid Trip! ACID TRIP is a 2d top-down shooter you can play it with raw brutality, hard-boiled gunplay, and skull-crushing close combat and defeat bosses, zombies, and don't die from shredders, traps to make it more hellish and brutal. it's like if doom was 2d. KILL , destroy, fuck up zombies. Oh, and look good to your friends by smashing their scores on the leaderboards. KEY FEATURES: Back-Breaking , Challenging Gameplay purchase Perks and upgrades to Kill, destroy, fuck up zombies more brutality!!! Endless Possibilities and a variety of powerups Fast-paced gameplay that will make the bones in your hands shatter!!! Leaderboards to prove you're better than the rest of the world, or at least your friends! Dodge, shoot, and destroy 8 challenging multi-form bosses Intense sound design with gurgling zombies and all that shit! Intense Musical Accompaniment
